SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am32
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am32.message.ServerToClient

Class DeckSizeUpdateMessage

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am32.message.ServerToClient.DeckSizeUpdateMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
StoCMessage, Serializable
public class DeckSizeUpdateMessage extends Object implements StoCMessage
This class is used to manage the message sent by the server to the client to update the deck after one player draws a card.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • DeckSizeUpdateMessage

      public DeckSizeUpdateMessage(String recipientNickname, int resourceCardDeckSize, int goldCardDeckSize, int[] currentResourceCards, int[] currentGoldCards, int resourceCardDeckFacingKingdom, int goldCardDeckFacingKingdom)
      The constructor of the class: it creates a new DeckSizeUpdateMessage with the nickname of the recipient who will receive the message to update the deck after the draw card action.
      Parameters:
      recipientNickname - the nickname of the player who will receive the message.
      resourceCardDeckSize - the size of the resource card deck after the draw card action.
      goldCardDeckSize - the size of the gold card deck after the draw card action.
      currentResourceCards - the current resource card visible after the draw card action.
      currentGoldCards - the current gold card visible after the draw card action.
      resourceCardDeckFacingKingdom - the resource card deck facing kingdom after the draw card action.
      goldCardDeckFacingKingdom - the gold card deck facing kingdom after the draw card action.

  • Method Details

    • processMessage

      public void processMessage(View view)
      This method is used to process the message to the client when the deck is updated after the draw card action. It updates the view with the new deck size and the current cards in the deck.
      Specified by:
      processMessage in interface StoCMessage
      Parameters:
      view - the view of the player who will receive the message and should be updated.

    • getRecipientNickname

      public String getRecipientNickname()
      This method is used to get the nickname of the recipient who will receive the message to update the deck.
      Specified by:
      getRecipientNickname in interface StoCMessage
      Returns:
      the nickname of the player who will receive the message.
